timingservice

类 ADBExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • timingservice.ADBExecutor

  • public class ADBExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    an executor of adb commands See Android Debug Bridge
    作者:
    hengxin

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      static int HOST_BASE_PORT

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void copy(java.lang.String device_id, java.lang.String src_path, java.lang.String dest_path)
      copy a file or directory (and its sub-directories) (specified by @param src_path) from the device specified by @param device_id to the destination directory in computer specified by @param dest_path
      void copyFromAll(java.lang.String src_path, java.lang.String dest_path)
      For each device, copy a file or directory (and its sub-directories) specified by @param src_path to the destination directory in computer specified by @param dest_path
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> execAdbDevices()
      execute the ADB command "adb devices" to get online device ids
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> execAdbOnlineDevicesPortForward()
      execute the "adb -s forward" commands for each device with different ports on the host PC
      void execAdbSingleDevicePortForward(java.lang.String device_id, int host_port, int to_port)
      forwarding the @param host_port of PC to the @param to_part of the device (e.g., an Android phone)
      void remove(java.lang.String device_id, java.lang.String path)
      remove file or directory (and its sub-directories recursively) specified by @param path from device specified by @param device_id
      void removeFromAll(java.lang.String path)
      remove file or directory (and its sub-directories recursively) from all attached devices
      void uninstall(java.lang.String apk)
      uninstall the specified apk from all the attached devices
      void uninstall(java.lang.String device_id, java.lang.String apk)
      uninstall the specified apk from the specified device

      • ADBExecutor

        public ADBExecutor(java.lang.String adb_directory)
        constructor of ADBExecutor
        参数:
        adb_directory - adb_directory: directory of "adb.exe"

    • 方法详细资料

      • execAdbDevices

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> execAdbDevices()
        execute the ADB command "adb devices" to get online device ids
        返回:
        a list of online device ids

      • execAdbOnlineDevicesPortForward

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> execAdbOnlineDevicesPortForward()
        execute the "adb -s forward" commands for each device with different ports on the host PC
        返回:
        map of (device, hostport)

      • execAdbSingleDevicePortForward

        public void execAdbSingleDevicePortForward(java.lang.String device_id,
                                  int host_port,
                                  int to_port)
        forwarding the @param host_port of PC to the @param to_part of the device (e.g., an Android phone)
        参数:
        device_id - forwarding a port to which device
        host_port - port of PC
        to_port - port of device (e.g., an Android phone)

      • uninstall

        public void uninstall(java.lang.String apk)
        uninstall the specified apk from all the attached devices
        参数:
        apk - apk to uninstall

      • uninstall

        public void uninstall(java.lang.String device_id,
             java.lang.String apk)
        uninstall the specified apk from the specified device
        参数:
        device_id - the device from which some apk is uninstalled
        apk - apk to uninstall

      • copy

        public void copy(java.lang.String device_id,
        java.lang.String src_path,
        java.lang.String dest_path)
        copy a file or directory (and its sub-directories) (specified by @param src_path) from the device specified by @param device_id to the destination directory in computer specified by @param dest_path
        参数:
        device_id - the device from which the file/directory is copied
        src_path - path of the file or directory to copy
        dest_path - path of directory in which copied file/directory is stored

      • copyFromAll

        public void copyFromAll(java.lang.String src_path,
               java.lang.String dest_path)
        For each device, copy a file or directory (and its sub-directories) specified by @param src_path to the destination directory in computer specified by @param dest_path
        参数:
        src_path - path of the file or directory to copy
        dest_path - path of directory in which copied file/directory is stored

      • removeFromAll

        public void removeFromAll(java.lang.String path)
        remove file or directory (and its sub-directories recursively) from all attached devices
        参数:
        path - specified file or directory to remove

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String device_id,
          java.lang.String path)
        remove file or directory (and its sub-directories recursively) specified by @param path from device specified by @param device_id
        参数:
        device_id - device from which the file or directory is removed
        path - file or directory to remove
